config.letterboxing.aspectratio.tooltip: Toggle between predefined formats or set your own
config.letterboxing.widthoff.tooltip: To use this slider, set aspect ratio to Custom
config.letterboxing.widthon.tooltip: Set the width of the aspect ratio
config.letterboxing.heightoff.tooltip: To use this slider, set aspect ratio to Custom
config.letterboxing.heighton.tooltip: Set the height of the aspect ratio
config.letterboxing.normal.tooltip: Toggle bar visibility for normal mode (survival, creative, adventure)
config.letterboxing.spectator.tooltip: Toggle bar visibility in spectator mode
config.letterboxing.f1.tooltip: Toggle bar visibility when HUD is deactivated via f1 key
config.letterboxing.carvedpumpkin.toolti:
If this is set to ON, the blurred pumpkin overlay is replaced with the current bar configuration
§l§cChanges to this require a restart of the game to take effect
config.letterboxing.warning.tooltip: §l§cYou may turn this OFF if another MOD also affects this setting
config.letterboxing.bossbarhud.tooltip: Adjust position of bossbar automatically to horizontal bar height
config.letterboxing.chat.tooltip: Adjust position of chat automatically to both bars
config.letterboxing.debug.tooltip: Adjust position of debug menu (f3 key) automatically to both bars
config.letterboxing.playerhud.tooltip: Adjust position of player HUD (hotbar, status bar, status effects, scoreboard, overlays) automatically to both bars
config.letterboxing.toasts.tooltip: Adjust position of toasts automatically to both bars
config.letterboxing.subtitles.tooltip: Adjust position of subtitles automatically to both bars
